articles.title: Live European oil sites hit by cyber attacks - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: A string of oil storage and transport companies across Europe have been targeted by cyber attacks, threatening to wreak further havoc in the already-strained market.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
Details are starting to come through about a spate of cyber attacks targeting European oil companies this week.
Two German fuel storage firms Mabanfaft and Oiltanking were crippled b… [+2126 chars]
